sqlMap.select: select user_id,user_name,pwd,user_email,add_time,last_login_time,removed_time,user_state,last_login_ip from vs_admin where user_name=#userName# and pwd=#pwd# and user_state=0 and (removed_time is null or removed_time = '')
select user_id,user_name,pwd,user_email,add_time,last_login_time, removed_time,user_state,last_login_ip from vs_admin where removed_time is null or removed_time = ''
select user_id,user_name,pwd,user_email,add_time,last_login_time, removed_time,user_state,last_login_ip from vs_admin where user_id=#userId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into vs_admin(user_id,user_name,pwd,user_email,add_time,user_state) values ((select ifnull(LPAD(max(CAST(tvs.user_id as SIGNED)+1),4,'0'),'0001') from vs_admin tvs), #userName#,#pwd#,#userEmail#,#addTime#,#userState#)
sqlMap.update: update vs_admin set removed_time=#removedTime# where user_id = #userId#
update vs_admin set last_login_time=#lastLoginTime# , last_login_ip=#lastLoginIp# where user_id = #userId#
update vs_admin set user_state=#userState# where user_id = #userId#
